column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Service is very good
column2: the ambiance is amazing. The food is out of this world (NY aged and bone in
column4: the side dishes are amazing ( elote
column5: macaroni and the mashed potatoes). Great drink selection (cocktails
column6: table wine and hard drinks). Good temperarure. Nice people and very good music. Dinner for 2 with drinks $200+. Would I come back? Yes
column7: I would most definitively come back.
